#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define MAX 1123456
typedef pair<int,int> pii;
int LIS[MAX],ct;
int N,num;

void solve(){
    cin >> N;
    for(int i = 0; i < N; ++i){
        cin >> num, num -= i;
        if (num <= 0) continue;
        if (ct == 0 || LIS[ct-1] <= num)
            LIS[ct++] = num;
        else if (LIS[0] > num)
            LIS[0] = num;
        else {
            int id = lower_bound(LIS,LIS+ct,num) - LIS;
            LIS[id] = num;
        }
    }
    cout << N-ct << endl;
}

int main()
{
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);
    solve();
    return 0;
}
